overview: Do sassy girls blowing bubbles get you horny? Then these lip-smackin' babes are just what the candy store ordered! They might want you to fuck their tight pussies and flip them over for some hard-driving cheek-spreading action, but don't interrupt them when they're blowing - not you - their bubbles! Now you don't need to be shy about your bubble gum fetish - ZT's got all the gum-snapping, bubble-busting scenes you can handle! Stuff those hot mouths full of the pink stuff and watch'em blow while you blow your load!
title: Bubble Gum
